# Not working as of 2024/09/02. See https://github.com/ohareza/forcedvr/issues

Enables the YouTube DVR on all streams.
Now you can rewind the video on every live stream! No more FOMO if you need to take breaks.

Note: You may need to refresh the page to make the DVR show up.
